') as lineInfo from traffic_res_line group by res_id) b ON(b.res_id=tr.id) left join (select res_id ,ifnull(sum(case when adjust_action='ORDER_SOLD' and adjust_state=0 then adjust_num else 0 end),0) unconfirm ,ifnull(sum(case when adjust_action='ORDER_SOLD' and adjust_state=1 then adjust_num else 0 end),0) confirm from traffic_res_stocklog where order_id>0 group by res_id ) as sale on sale.res_id=trp.res_id where tr.state=1 and trp.product_code>0 AND tr.biz_id =#{page.parameter.bizId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND tr.date_latest >= now() AND trp.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{page.parameter.productName},'%' ) and tr.res_method =#{page.parameter.resMethod} AND tr.date_start >= #{page.parameter.startMin} AND tr.date_start <= #{page.parameter.startMax} AND tr.res_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{page.parameter.resName},'%' ) ) aa where (supplierCountMy > 0 or supplierCount=supplierCountMy) ORDER BY date_start
